item.title: Travelling Green - Limiting your Environmental Impact
item.author: gupta.karan.11@gmail.com (Karan Gupta)
item.description: Trash! One of those things that are the most commonplace in our daily lives. Most of us despise it but we would not like to think about it. Is it not worthy of our thoughts? Plastic is one demon that has turned things around recently. #planetvsplastic, other popular hashtags on social media and celebrity involvement have brought forth the problems that non bio-degradable garbage and plastics in particular pose.
